title: Waking Up to Financial Freedom: The Reality of Passive Income
subtitle: Discover the benefits of passive income and smart investing to achieve financial independence and explore early retirement options. Learn how to set and achieve your financial goals effectively.
content:
Waking Up to Financial Freedom: The Reality of Passive Income

Wake up. We need to talk.

What time is it?

Noon on a Tuesday.

You're still in bed?

Yeah, I'm not working today.

Understanding Passive Income

No, you said you worked on Tuesdays.

No, I said my money works for me on Tuesdays. I live at home with you to cut back on expenses.

Smart Investments

Work a few hours on the weekend. I've been putting $500 a month into my Roth IRA.

The account will be worth just under a million by the time I'm 48.

Planning for Retirement

I'll most likely retire with a little over $5 million.

Isn't that more than you have from working a 9-to-5 your entire life?

I'm going back to bed. Could you shut the door on the way out?
